pages.text: Pikaia is a primitive chordate from the middle Cambrian that resembled a lancelet and may have swam like an eel. It had a series of short appendages near the front of its body and gills on either side of its head. It also exhibited a tail fin.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
